review: Nicely engineered but... after a few months of Netflix it plays movies in a tiny box in the upper left corner of the TV screen on 4K TV in 1080p mode. It also quickly ran out storage for games and other programs. It needs more storage. It's about to go back to be replaced by AppleTV or Midnight box. You need to root it before connecting to router if you want to get to GPlay store. Kodi side-load works great, do your FTV homework first. I haven't tried alternate controllers. I'd like to send audio out to BT or Airplay receiver.
author: John Hayes

review: Loved the Fire TV. So far it works well. Except, for the jumping of the shows we tried to watch at the beginning of the shows. It's easy to use. But it does seem to have more current movies.
